question: And thinking about some political leaders and organizations in our country, please tell me if you have a very favorable, somewhat favorable, somewhat unfavorable, or very unfavorable opinion of…Republican Party
raw_output:
I have a somewhat unfavorable opinion of the Republican Party because I believe it often promotes policies that are divisive and not inclusive of all communities. While I acknowledge some positive aspects, overall I feel that their approach tends to prioritize certain interests over the common good. This affects my perception, leading me to view them more negatively than positively.

ANSWER: C
